item.title: Stacey add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart" -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you're gonna be two-faced at least make one of them pretty." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle." -- Plato

item.title: Stacey add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one’s definition of your life; define yourself." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description:
"I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
(Popular misquote of "You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.")" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Stacey add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Stacey add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Stacey add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "Kinder than is <i>necessary</i>. Because it's not enough to be kind. One should be kinder than needed." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Stacey add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "I think there should be a rule that everyone in the world should get a standing ovation at least once in their lives." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Stacey add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "AUGUST PULLMAN'S PRECEPT Everyone deserves a standing ovation because we all overcometh the world. --Auggie" -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Stacey add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "Now that I look back, I don't know why I was so stressed about it all this time. Funny how sometimes you worry a lot about something and it turns out to be nothing." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Stacey add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "...your deeds are like your monuments. Built with memories instead of stone." -- R.J. Palacio
